Package org.apache.wiki.auth.permissions

Class Summary
AllPermission Permission to perform all operations on a given wiki.
AllPermissionCollection A collection of AllPermission objects.
GroupPermission Permission to perform an operation on a group in a given wiki.
PagePermission Permission to perform an operation on a single page or collection of pages in a given wiki.
PermissionFactory Provides a factory for Permission objects.
WikiPermission Permission to perform an global wiki operation, such as self-registering or creating new pages.
